FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to common questions here

items.question: Is the data from this size conversion tool accurate?
items.answer: Yes, our data is collected directly from official brand size charts.

items.question: Which country and region sizing standards do you support?
items.answer: We currently support major global sizing systems.

items.question: Why do suggested sizes sometimes differ between brands?
items.answer: Because different brands use different lasts or cutting processes.

items.question: What if my measurement falls between two sizes?
items.answer: It is generally recommended to follow the 'size up' rule.

items.question: Is this tool free to use?
items.answer: Completely free. We are committed to providing convenient tools; you can use all features without registering.
